title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
The first point is earned for 2y dy dx −2xy− x 2 dy dx =0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIYaGaamyEamaalaaaba GaamizaiaadMhaaeaacaWGKbGaamiEaaaacqGHsislcaaIYaGaamiE aiaadMhacqGHsislcaWG4bWaaWbaaSqabeaacaaIYaaaaOWaaSaaae aacaWGKbGaamyEaaqaaiaadsgacaWG4baaaiabg2da9iaaicdaaaa@44E9@ or equivalent.

The second point is earned for a response that arrives at the given expression rather than an algebraically equivalent expression.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
The second point may be earned if response contains an incorrect value for slope based on one computational error.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
At most 1 out of 2 implicit differentiation points is earned for correct implicit differentiation with a correct application of the quotient rule and chain rule with a maximum of one computational error.

The third point requires substitution of values with a consistent use of the y- MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG5bGaaeylaaaa@34E2@ coordinate from part (c). A simplified answer is not required although the expression should simplify to 1 regardless of the y- MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG5bGaaeylaaaa@34E2@ coordinate value.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
